name: Battle Crown
description:
Platform & Fighting Multiplayer Game

All for one (Co-op mode) : 2-4 players will spawn in a 2D arena. Then, they’ll have to kill in cooperation the king NPC to drop his crown.

One for all (Versus mode) : Next, the players have to keep the only one crown on their head to be the king as long as possible. They can attack the actual king to get the crown with some weapons that randomly spawn on the map.
